scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.install:ml: cd ml && python3 -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.build:all: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:ml"
